t: Could a Nicotine Inhaler Be the Best Way for You to Quit Smoking?
s: January 29, 2021 - Some insurance plans do pay for Nicotrol. Check with your plan to see if it’s covered. The cost of a pack of cigarettes depends on federal and state taxes. The average cost is between $6 to $8 per pack. If you smoke a pack a day, this could average between $180 to $240 dollars a month. But there are much higher costs to your overall health the longer you smoke. E-cigarette prices depend on the brand...
